Verses: 1 dhaaniyElaagiya enakku mudhalil kaaNbikkappatta dharisanaththukkuppinbu, raajaavaagiya pelshaadhsaar raajyabaarampaNNina moondraam varushaththilE vERoru dharisanam enakkuk kaaNbikkappattadhu.
2 dharisanaththilE naan kaNdadhu ennavendraal: naan paarkkaiyil Elaam dhEsaththiluLLa� soosaan aramanaiyil irundhEn; angE naan oolaai ennum aatrangaraiyil irundhadhaaga dharisanaththilE kaNdEn.

3 naan en kaNgaLai EReduththuppaarththEn; idhO, iraNdu kombugaLuLLa oru aattukkadaa aatriRku munbaaga nindradhu; adhin iraNdu kombugaLum uyarndhavaigaLaayirundhadhu; aagilum avaigaLil ondru matradhaippaarkkilum uyarndhirundhadhu; uyarndhakombu pindhi muLaiththezhumbitru.

4 andha aattukkadaa mERkum vadakkum theRkum paaigiRadhaik kaNdEn; oru mirugamum adhin munnE niRkak koodaadhirundhadhu; adhin kaikkuth thappuvippaarumillai; adhu than ishtappadiyE seydhu vallamaikoNdadhu.

5 naan adhai gavaniththukkoNdirukkaiyil, idhO, mERkEyirundhu oru veLLaattukkadaa nilaththilE kaal paavaamal dhEsaththinmeedhengum sendradhu; andha veLLaattukkadaavin kaNgaLukku naduvE visEshiththa oru kombu irundhadhu.
6 naan aatrin munbaaga niRkakkaNda iraNdu kombugaLuLLa aattukkadaavinidamattum adhuvandhu, thanbalaththin ukkiraththOdE adhaRku edhiraagap paaindhadhu.

7 adhu aattukkadaavin kitta sErakkaNdEn; adhu aattukkadaavinmEl kadunkObankoNdu adhai mutti, adhin iraNdu kombugaLaiyum muRiththuppOttadhu, adhinmun niRka aattukkadaavukku balamillaamaiyaal, veLLaattukkadaa adhaith tharaiyilE thaLLi midhiththuppOttadhu, adhin kaikku aattukkadaavaith thappuvippaar illai.

8 appozhudhu veLLaattukkadaa migudhiyum vallamaikoNdadhu; adhu palankoNdirukkaiyil, andhap periya kombu muRindhupOyitru; adhaRkup padhilaaga aagaayaththin naaluthisaigaLukkum edhiraai visEshiththa naalukombugaL muLaiththezhumbinadhu.
9 avaigaLil ondrilirundhu sinnadhaana oru kombu puRappattu theRkukkum, kizhakkukkum edhiraagavum, singaaramaana dhEsaththukku nEraagavum migavum periyadhaayitru.
10 adhu vaanaththin sEnaipariyandham vaLarndhu, adhin sEnaiyaagiya natchaththirangaLil silavatrai boomiyilE vizhappaNNi, avaigaLai midhiththadhu.
11 adhu sEnaiyinudaiya adhipadhi pariyandhamum thannai uyarththi, avaridaththilirundhu andraada paliyai neekkitru; avarudaiya parisuththa Sthaanam thaLLuNdadhu.
12 paadhagaththinimiththam andraada paliyOdunkooda sEnaiyum adhaRku oppukkodukkappattadhu; adhu saththiyaththaith tharaiyilE thaLLitru; adhu kiriyaiseydhu anugoolamadaindhadhu.

13 parisuththavaanaagiya oruvan pEsakkEttEn; appozhudhu vERoru parisuththavaan pEsinavarai nOkki: andraada paliyaikkuRiththum, paazhkkadippai uNdaakkum paadhagaththaikkuRiththum, parisuththa Sthalamum sEnaiyum midhipada oppukkodukkappaduvadhaikkuRiththum, uNdaana dharisanam edhuvaraikkum irukkum endru kEttaan.
14 avan ennai nOkki: iraNdaayiraththu munnooRu raappagal sellumvaraikkum irukkum, pinbu parisuththa Sthalam suththigarikkappadum endraan.
15 dhaaniyElaagiya naan indha dharisanaththaikkaNdu, adhin poruLai aRiya vagaithEdugaiyil, idhO, manushasaayalaana oruvan enakku edhirE nindraan.
16 andriyum kaabiriyElE, ivanukku dharisanaththai viLangappaNNendru oolaayin maththiyilE kooppittu sollugiRa oru manusha saththaththaiyum kEttEn�.

17 appozhudhu avan naan nindra idaththukku vandhaan; avan varugaiyil naan thidukkittu mugankuppuRa vizhundhEn; avan ennai nOkki: manupuththiranE gavani; indha dharisanam mudivukaalaththukku aduththadhu endraan.
18 avan ennOdE pEsugaiyil, naan tharaiyil mugankuppuRakkidandhu, ayarndha niththiraikoNdEn; avanO ennaith thottu, naan kaaloondri niRkumpadi seydhu:
19 idhO, kObaththin mudivukaalaththilE sambavippadhai unakkuth therivippEn; idhu kuRikkappatta mudivukaalaththukku aduththadhu.
20 nee kaNda iraNdu kombuLLa aattukkadaa mEdhiyaa persiyaa dhEsangaLin raajaakkaL;
21 rOmamuLLa andha veLLaattukkadaa grEkku dhEsaththin raajaa; adhin kaNgaLukku naduvE irundha periya kombu adhin mudhalaam raajaa;
22 adhu muRindhupOnapinbu adhaRkup padhilaaga naalu kombugaL ezhumbinadhu ennavendraal, andha jaadhiyilE naalu raajyangaL ezhumbum; aanaalum avanukku irundha vallamai avaigaLukku iraadhu.
23 avargaLudaiya raajyabaaraththin kadaisikkaalaththilOvendraal, paadhagarudaiya paadhagam niRaivERumpOdhu, moorkka mugamum soodhaana pEchchumuLLa saamarththiyamaana oru raajaa ezhumbuvaan.

24 avanudaiya vallamai perugum; aanaalum avanudaiya suyabalaththinaalalla, avan adhisayamaanavidhamaaga azhimbuNdaakki, anugoolam petrukkiriyaiseydhu, balavaangaLaiyum parisuththa janangaLaiyum azhippaan.

25 avan than ubaayaththinaal vanjagaththaik kaikoodivarappaNNi, than irudhayaththil perumaikoNdu, nirvisaaraththOdirukkiRa anEgarai azhiththu, adhipadhigaLukku adhipadhiyaayirukkiRavarukku virOdhamaai ezhumbuvaan, aanaalum avan kaiyinaalalla vERuvidhamaai muRiththuppOdappaduvaan.
26 sollappatta raappagalgaLindharisanam saththiyamaayirukkiRadhu; aadhalaal indha dharisanaththai nee maRaiththuvai; adhaRku innum anEganaaL sellum endraan.

27 dhaaniyElaagiya naan sOrvadaindhu, silanaaL vyaadhippattirundhEn; pinbu naan ezhundhirundhu, raajaavin vElaiyai seydhu, andha dharisanaththinaal thigaiththukkoNdirundhEn; oruvarum adhai aRiyavillai.
